choices: The Android dog who will name later
1.content:
You are Alex you're 24 years old with dirty brown short hair, you use to work as an engineer for an android factory on till there was an explosion, when you were working on a new type of skin for the Android you was working on three new androids.

One was a young female adult, who you called Paula and there was a little girl Android that looked like she could be 9 years old you called her jo Short for Joanne, just for fun you was also working on an Android dog that was a husky but you didn't get to name the dog.

If as been a year now and you live with paula,Jo and the dog, you wake up in your tiny bed that was sitting on a table just then one on the androids walked in to see how you are, who was it
1.title: The beginning

info.brief_description: You are a tiny person who lives in a world shared by Android and humans.
info.description:
You used to work as a engineer for an Android factory to one day there was an explosion that somehow made you really tiny about two inches tall you always looked after the Androids but now you are being looked after by an adult female Android, a little girl Android and a android husky who you were repairing at the time of the explosion, the androids would never harm you but they are sometimes playful.

You are one of those kinda guys always joking around not taking things too seriously but can get you in a little bit of trouble with the Androids one of your favourite jokes is asking them do they use in Android phone or an Apple phone.

To keep you safe, the Androids would keep you somewhere on them if you know what I mean which you some time think they like too much.
